DOC.brief_summary: Low back pain common disease . Among person suffer acute low back pain , 10 % risk developping chronic pain . A screening questionnaire assess risk develop validated Swedish English ( Orebro Musculoskeletal Pain Screening Questionnaire , Linton , 2003 ) . The aim study validate french translation questionnaire . Patients suffer acute low back pain ask fill several questionnaire day 0 , 6 12 month later .
DOC.brief_title: French Validation Orebro Musculoskeletal Pain Screening Questionnaire ( OMPSQ ) Questionnaire
